description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(788).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,786,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (28 + 393*x + 28*x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 786*x^2 + x^4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 26 2013a(n) = 786*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 26 2013
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[788], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(28 + 393 x + 28 x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 786 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 25 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[28, 393, 22036, 308897]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 786*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 26 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
